a.n: Lianne La Havas - Casino de Paris

p.k: Lianne La Havas' performance at Casino de Paris shows the British singer-songwriter at her best. This concert is part of La Havas' 'Blood Tour', promoting her second album 'Blood' (2015).
p.d: Lianne La Havas' performance at Casino de Paris captures the British singer-songwriter at her best: with her crystalline voice she performs soulful melodies full of sincerity. The performance is part of La Havas' 'Blood Tour', a concert tour promoting her second album 'Blood' (2015). She is accompanied by James Wyatt on keys, Adam Prendergast on bass, Giles King Ashong on drums, and Frida Touray on backing vocals.
